channel.title: Need Coders For Construction V2 (It WILL be the best)
channel.description:
Dear fellow Moparscape coders, I am looking for a team to make the ultimate construction skill. This will be one of the biggest challenges of you Moparscape programming career. I am not looking for just any coders. I want the best of the best. Here are some requirements.
~You must be known as a good coder ~You must know that you could possibly lose your main Moparscape client ~You will need a cache unpacker ~You will need a cache packer
If we can successfully create this skill you be know as one of the best coders out there (probably better then Oblak).
If you want to participate in this use the following application thing.
[code]Username: Links to 3 of your best work:[/code]
Thank you, M.dog311

If you’ve downloaded the newest moparscape client then you have the cache files.
